conditions: It's Sunday Fun Day! Come and celebrate the sunshine as Rendezvous Mountain will be engulfed in Bluebird skies all day long. Morning ski conditions will be fast and fantastic while they soften up throughout the day. On the Mountain, look for calm ridgetop winds trending out of the Southwest at 5-10 MPH. Afternoon temperatures will reach the mid-20's across the high elevation terrain while the valley floor will climb into the upper 30's by late morning. Set your cruise control to mellow and come massage the slopes of The Big One with the edges of your planks. It will be a good day to ski any and all terrain. Stay safe out there! -MB
